ygData.subject: Grobb Cleaver Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw a post this morning that said the Troll in OOT is between 20-24th level MOB. It also siad that getting the Recipe from the Troll (by killing it) lowered
ygData.messageBody:
I saw a post this morning that said the Troll in OOT is
between 20-24th level MOB. It also siad that getting the
Recipe from the Troll (by killing it) lowered faction
with DaBashers and Shadow Knights of Grobb. /con Carver
before you kill Nerbilik and see what you con to him.
Try to get your faction up to about Amiable if not
already (ie indifferant). This way the faction hits will
not prevent you from getting the Cleaver. The poster
said he gave the Cleaver with a /con of dubious.
What raises Faction with Grobb SKs and DaBashers?
I don't know if you need to do the locker part of the
quest or not. Anyone?

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
10th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
